src.Quest

Class QuestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Quest.QuestHandler

  • public class QuestHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class tracks all of the player's active quests and updates the values as required

        Load all of the user's active quests from the database
        Parameters:
        userID - The ID of the current user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL could not retrieve the quests from the database

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(java.lang.String eventType,
                            java.lang.String target)
        An event has occurred in the game that might increase the progress of some quests. Check if it does. Look through each quest and see if the type and target match.
        Parameters:
        eventType - The type of event that took place
        target - The target of the event that took place
